                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8796%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过96万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学疫情实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间26日下午5时31分，美国共有新冠病毒感染病例963168例，死亡病例54614例。与该系统约24小时前的数据相比，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B30118%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新增新冠病毒感染病例30118例#</a>，新增死亡病例1223例。（人民日报记者郑琪） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】武汉在院新冠肺炎患者今天清零，这是继新增清零、重症清零后又一里程碑意义的节点。每个清零都值得铭记，因为这离抗疫胜利又近了一步；每次进展都值得感怀，因为这背后凝聚着无数心血。“江汉春风起，冰霜昨夜除”，以归零心态直面清零控零，以奋进姿态求得复工复产，终会夺取全胜！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%84%E6%BD%9C%E6%B0%B4%E5%91%98%E7%99%BD%E6%B5%B7%E5%86%B0%E4%B8%8B%E6%8B%8D%E5%88%B0%E8%A3%B8%E6%B5%B7%E8%9D%B6%23&amp;from=default">#俄潜水员白海冰下拍到裸海蝶#</a> 挥舞着透明翅膀像跳舞<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，俄罗斯潜水员在白海冰下拍到裸海蝶。裸海蝶是一种浮游软体动物，生活在北极、南极等寒冷海域的冰层之下，因游动时拍动着透明的两翼，外型看似传说中的天使，又被人称作“海天使”。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498091346144633:1034-video:1034%3A4498014467719191:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498091346144633:2803301701" title="青蕉视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AvpbRl" alt="http://t.cn/A6AvpbRl" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>青蕉视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2328%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E7%BB%8F%E6%B7%B1%E5%9C%B3%E5%8F%A3%E5%B2%B8%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%B0%B1%E5%9C%B0%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#28日起经深圳口岸入境就地集中隔离14天#</a>】26日，深圳市人民政府口岸办公室发布通知称，根据广东省疫情防控工作的统一部署，自4月28日8时起，经深圳口岸入境人员，均需在深圳市就地集中隔离医学观察14天，请各位旅客提前做好准备。<a title="最新！4月28日8时起，经深圳口岸入境者，一律..." href="http://t.cn/A6APMaWH" alt="http://t.cn/A6APMaWH" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>最新！4月28日8时起，经深圳口岸入境者，一律...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498083838254657" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF9BJyDpD?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 22:10" date="1587910219000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498083838254657:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 22:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8B%AC%E8%85%BF%E7%94%BB%E5%AE%B6%E6%B5%81%E6%B5%AA%E4%BD%9C%E7%94%BB36%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#独腿画家流浪作画36年#</a>：曾遇坏人差点遇害，因生活磨难学会感恩】59岁的从兰桂16岁时因患骨肿瘤左大腿截肢，23岁开始出门自学画画维生。最近他画了很多抗疫英雄的画像。他曾遇到坏人差点被害，但碰到更多的是好人。他说自己想开一间画室，“靠劳动来生存，是从来不卑微的。”<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498083838254657:2017607-video:2017607%3A4497273359630352:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498083838254657:2803301701" title="一手video的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wdBLPA" alt="http://t.cn/A6wdBLPA" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>一手video的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4498078570777266&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=5060247370&amp;commentmid=4498074296630240" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>247</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-26 21:49</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

                                <a name="4498056453707729" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF8Tzfyy5?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 20:21" date="1587903691000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498056453707729:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 20:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%80%E5%A0%82%E4%B8%8D%E5%BC%A0%E5%98%B4%E7%9A%84%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#如何上一堂不张嘴的音乐课#</a>？老师：打节奏学乐理】王鑫是四川眉山一所中学的音乐老师，负责学校12个班级的音乐课。疫情期间，学生们上课遇到了难题：戴口罩唱歌会闷，摘口罩有风险。王鑫决定用节奏训练法教授乐理知识，还制作了课件带领同学们一起“搞气氛”。结果学生们“比平时唱歌还要积极”。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF8Tzfyy5" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498056453707729:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498056453707729&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BD%93%E5%B0%8F%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E8%A2%AB%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E8%AF%B4%E9%95%BF%E8%83%96%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#当小朋友被老师说长胖了#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E8%A2%AB%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E8%AF%B4%E9%95%BF%E8%83%96%E4%BA%86%E8%BE%B9%E5%93%AD%E8%BE%B9%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#小朋友被老师说长胖了边哭边运动#</a> 越想越委屈蹲角落里呜呜呜】4月24日，天津一位小朋友与老师视频时，老师开玩笑地说他长胖了。小家伙反驳后生气地挂了班级视频。之后他开始疯狂运动，一边运动一边哭，最后干脆回房间躲角落里哭去了。网友：我要有这个自尊心早瘦成闪电了 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF8H6iv2L" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498048724409239:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498048724409239&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                                            </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                                                                                    <!-- feed区 大数据tag -->
                    </div>
        <div class="WB_like" node-type="templeLike_ani" action-data="parise_id=p_0000" style="display:none;">
            <div class="anibox UI_ani" style="background-image:url(//img.t.sinajs.cn/t6/skin/public/like/p_0000_pc.png?version=8360e4a841c8aaec);"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IF8rrflZo&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497636&amp;ssig=YPrQwnXAW2" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498039013659450" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF8rrflZo?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 19:12" date="1587899533000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498039013659450:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 19:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%81%E4%B8%89%E5%B1%8A%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%B8%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E7%AC%AC%E5%8D%81%E4%B8%83%E6%AC%A1%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%AE%E9%87%87%E7%94%A8%E7%8E%B0%E5%9C%BA%E5%92%8C%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#十三届全国人大常委会第十七次会议采用现场和网络视频方式举行#</a>】十三届全国人大常委会第十七次会议26日下午在北京人民大会堂举行第一次全体会议。本次会议采用现场出席和网络视频出席相结合的方式举行，常委会组成人员123人现场出席会议，47人通过网络视频方式出席会议，共170人。会议审议了全国人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF8rrflZo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498039013659450:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498039013659450&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497636&amp;ssig=YPrQwnXAW2" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498031880043259" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF8fW0bfJ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 18:43" date="1587897831000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498031880043259:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 18:43</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E5%B0%94%E6%BB%A8%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E6%95%A3%E5%B8%83%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%82%B9%E5%9D%8D%E5%A1%8C%E8%B0%A3%E8%A8%80%E8%A2%AB%E8%A1%8C%E6%8B%98%23&amp;from=default">#哈尔滨女子散布隔离点坍塌谣言被行拘#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E5%B0%94%E6%BB%A8%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E9%80%A0%E8%B0%A3%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%82%B9%E5%9D%8D%E5%A1%8C%E8%A2%AB%E8%A1%8C%E6%8B%985%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#哈尔滨女子造谣隔离点坍塌被行拘5日#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E9%81%93%E9%87%8C?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安道里">@平安道里</a> 通报，日前有微博账号“我叫春小妮”散布谣言称“黑龙江新冠肺炎隔离点突发大火坍塌！10人死亡70多人遇难！”，经查为哈尔滨市道里区居民任某（女，32岁）。警方将任某传唤后经询问，任某对自己散布谣言扰乱 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF8fW0bfJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498031880043259:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498031880043259&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497636&amp;ssig=YPrQwnXAW2" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498029971098354" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF8cR4BJo?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 18:36" date="1587897376000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498029971098354:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 18:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E4%BB%8D%E6%9C%89%E4%B8%80%E5%A4%84%E7%81%AB%E7%82%B9%23&amp;from=default">#青岛小珠山山火仍有一处火点#</a>：已调动6架消防飞机120余辆消防车参与扑救】26日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%BB%84%E5%B2%9B%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=黄岛发布">@黄岛发布</a> 发布通告，截至4月26日下午4时，黄岛小珠山山林火灾仍有辛安街道上庄区域一处火点，现场扑救工作仍在进行中。因火情现场地形险峻、扑救人员无法到达，现场指挥部统一调动消防飞机6架实施扑救，调动无人机4架 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF8cR4BJo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498029971098354:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498029971098354&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498024032046801" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF83h8AsV?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 18:12" date="1587895961000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498024032046801:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 18:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【浙江高校<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%BF%E7%AE%A1%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%A8%E4%B8%80%E5%91%A8%E4%BA%91%E6%8E%A5%E5%8D%95%E6%99%92%E8%A2%AB3000%E6%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#宿管阿姨一周云接单晒被3000条#</a>】浙江绍兴文理学院日前向近3个月未返校的学生发送提示，需要晾晒被子或有其他服务的同学，可提出后由宿管阿姨代办。一周下来，数十名宿管阿姨已经晒了3000条被子。除晒被子外，阿姨还帮助同学们给绿植浇水等。网友：好羡慕这样的宿管阿姨<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF83h8AsV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498024032046801:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498024032046801&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E7%A4%BE%E9%83%A8%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E6%9C%80%E4%BD%8E%E5%B7%A5%E8%B5%84%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%23&amp;from=default">#人社部发布全国各地区最低工资标准#</a>，看看你那是多少？】人社部网站26日发布<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E6%9C%80%E4%BD%8E%E5%B7%A5%E8%B5%84%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%23&amp;from=default">#全国各地区最低工资标准#</a>情况(截至2020年3月31日)，数据显示，上海月最低工资标准最高，为2480元；北京为2200元，广东为2100元，其中深圳为2200元。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6wsdqKo" alt="http://t.cn/A6wsdqKo" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498014620435305" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF7O61Pf3?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 17:35" date="1587893716000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498014620435305:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 17:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【现场画面！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E6%89%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#武汉最后一批新冠肺炎患者出院#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“终于等到这一天！”4月26日，随着武汉市肺科医院新冠病人丁某出院，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%9C%A8%E9%99%A2%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉在院新冠肺炎患者清零#</a> 。网友：武汉痊愈那一天才是中国人民的新年<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498014620435305:1034-video:1034%3A4498007119560740:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498014620435305:2803301701" title="长江日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AvaZOy" alt="http://t.cn/A6AvaZOy" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>长江日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498010497603310" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF7HrvTY2?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 17:18" date="1587892734000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498010497603310:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 17:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【广州一<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8C%81%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%BB%BF%E7%A0%81%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E5%89%8D%E6%8E%92%E6%9F%A5%E5%91%88%E9%98%B3%E6%80%A7%23&amp;from=default">#持湖北绿码学生返校前排查呈阳性#</a>】据广州卫健委，4月25日0时至24时，新增无症状感染者2例。新增无症状感染者1：女，27岁，籍贯新疆，常住广州市站前街，微商。为近期一例感染者的密切接触者，在集中隔离观察期间，核酸检测阳性；新增无症状感染者2：女，15岁，籍贯湖北，常住广州市德胜新村 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF7HrvTY2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498010497603310:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498010497603310&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E7%BB%B5%E9%98%B3%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%23&amp;from=default">#四川绵阳山火#</a> 突击队已赶赴现场】4月26日下午1点50分左右，四川绵阳市安州区千佛镇双电村发生山火，从网络上流传的现场视频来看，现场火势较大，浓烟滚滚，可以看到大片森林已经燃烧起来。目前安州区已派出3个突击队第一时间赶赴现场。愿平安！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498005077621563:1034-video:1034%3A4497995060674571:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498005077621563:2803301701" title="四川观察的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AvtmsF" alt="http://t.cn/A6AvtmsF" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>四川观察的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E5%A4%AA%E5%B9%B3%E6%B4%8B%E5%B2%9B%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%B6%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%A7%B0%E5%BA%94%E6%84%9F%E8%B0%A2%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#南太平洋岛国零确诊称应感谢中国#</a>】南太平洋岛国萨摩亚至今仍保持无一例新冠肺炎确诊病例的记录。该国首席防疫专家汉塞尔表示，“萨摩亚至今零确诊，我们要感谢中国！”。中国在3月上旬曾同萨摩亚等太平洋岛国分享防疫经验。萨摩亚参考中国做法采取了一系列措施，如暂停海外旅行、限制超市开放时间 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF7oLbIZ4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497998912794530:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497998912794530&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4497993694919087" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF7glkDG7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 16:12" date="1587888728000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497993694919087:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 16:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【这个0来之不易！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%9C%A8%E9%99%A2%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉在院新冠肺炎患者清零#</a>】经过武汉和全国援鄂医务人员的共同努力，4月26日，武汉在院新冠肺炎患者清零。这一天我们等了太久，谢谢每个为战疫付出的你！转起~ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A6%8F%E5%BB%BA%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A15%E6%9C%886%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E5%8F%AF%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E5%A4%8D%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#福建高校5月6日起可返校复学#</a>】4月26日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A6%8F%E5%BB%BA%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#福建开学时间#</a>确定。5月6日起，福建省中职学校、高职院校、本科高校、研究生毕业年级和其他年级有重要科研任务的学生返校复学，毕业实习（顶岗实习）同步启动安排。5月11日起，福建省中学高一、高二、初一、初二和小学三到六年级返校复学；5月20日起，福建 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF7eObPkk" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497992742818912:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497992742818912&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%8E%E5%8C%97%E9%BB%84%E6%B7%AE%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E9%98%B2%E6%9A%91%E9%98%B2%E6%99%92%23&amp;from=default">#华北黄淮五一假期防暑防晒#</a>！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%A9%BF%E8%A1%A3%E5%9C%B0%E5%9B%BE%23&amp;from=default">#五一全国穿衣地图#</a>】今天，《2020年五一假期出行预测报告》发布，天气数据显示，五一假期我国中东部大部地区气温较高，华北至华南大部地区的最高气温基本都在25℃以上，其中河北南部、河南中北部部分地区可能迎来今年以来的首个高温日！戳↓↓转存，用得上~<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%A9%E6%B0%94?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国天气">@中国天气</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

    </div>

                                <a name="4497980994786037" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF6VRk549?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 15:21" date="1587885700000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497980994786037:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 15:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BF%916%E6%88%90%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#境外输入病例近6成治愈出院#</a>】4月26日，国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋表示，4月25日境外输入确诊病例已有近6成治愈出院，其中重症病例较一周前下降了53.2%。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%859%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球单日新增确诊病例超9万例#</a>，境外疫情继续扩散蔓延，输入我国风险持续加大，本土聚集性疫情仍有确诊病例报告，要克服麻痹松懈思想， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF6VRk549" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497980994786037:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497980994786037&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4497978050256819" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF6R714Of?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 15:09" date="1587884997000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497978050256819:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 15:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%9C%A8%E9%99%A2%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉在院新冠肺炎患者清零#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋表示，刚刚得到最新消息，经过武汉和全国援鄂医务人员的共同努力，4月26日，武汉在院新冠肺炎患者清零。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制15时召开新闻发布会，介绍<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E5%BC%BA%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%E8%B4%A8%E9%87%8F%E7%9B%91%E7%AE%A1%23&amp;from=default">#加强医疗防控物资出口质量监管#</a>工作情况，商务部、海关总署、市场监管总局、药监局有关司局负责人回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 现场直播，一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497975818415172:1034-video:1034%3A4497989876776982:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497975818415172:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AvPxAu" alt="http://t.cn/A6AvPxAu" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【美！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%AD%E5%B1%B1%E5%85%AC%E5%9B%AD%E9%83%81%E9%87%91%E9%A6%99%E7%83%82%E6%BC%AB%E7%9B%9B%E5%BC%80%23&amp;from=default">#北京中山公园郁金香烂漫盛开#</a>】本周末，北京中山公园郁金香全部盛开，各色花朵争奇斗艳，仿佛在景区内搭起一条“花路”。最美人间四月天，提醒：出游、赏花请勿扎堆聚集↓↓转给没出门的小伙伴，抓住春天的尾巴，一起云赏花！ ​​​​                                            </div>

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497645&amp;ssig=RqmB0aq6Ph" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497964699969407" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF6vzFPuT?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 14:16" date="1587881815000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497964699969407:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 14:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E6%8B%9F%E5%B0%86%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%8A%97%E4%BD%93%E6%B5%8B%E5%AE%9A%E7%BA%B3%E5%85%A5%E5%8C%BB%E4%BF%9D%23&amp;from=default">#广州拟将新冠病毒抗体测定纳入医保#</a>】广州市医疗保障局发布《关于严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒抗体测定项目价格的通知(征求意见稿)》，拟将冠状病毒抗体测定纳入广州医保范围。根据该征求意见稿，严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒抗体测定拟制定医疗服务价格为：三级医院50元/项，二级医院45元/项，一级医 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF6vzFPuT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497964699969407:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497964699969407&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-26 14:19</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【等你归来！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B739%E6%89%80%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E6%B5%B7%E6%8A%A5%23&amp;from=default">#上海39所高校发布返校海报#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%E8%B5%B7%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%90%84%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%88%86%E6%89%B9%E6%AC%A1%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%23&amp;from=default">#明天起上海各高校分批次返校#</a>。告别时，寒冬暮雪；再见时，初夏芳菲。校园的花开好了，宿舍的被子帮大家晒了，食堂的菜谱已精心搭配…各大高校已做好准备，迎接同学们返校。戳图↓↓围观上海高校的返校海报 <a title="等你归来！沪上39所高校发布返校海报" href="http://t.cn/A6wsN60G" alt="http://t.cn/A6wsN60G" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>等你归来！沪上39所高校发布返校海报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4497956646672521"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>3522</em></span></span></span></a>

                </li>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497946605135341" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF62olxW5?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 13:05" date="1587877501000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497946605135341:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 13:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发提醒！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%95%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E5%92%A8%E8%AF%A2%E4%BB%8A%E6%97%A5%E5%BC%80%E5%90%AF%23&amp;from=default">#考研复试网上咨询今日开启#</a>】4月26日至30日，教育部将在“中国研究生招生信息网”组织“2020年研考招生复试网上咨询”，各招生单位将在线为考生答疑解惑。教育部网上调剂系统预计于5月20日左右开通。考研小伙伴，戳链接咨询→<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6wsb6UO" alt="http://t.cn/A6wsb6UO" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ，加油！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%95%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E5%92%A8%E8%AF%A2%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B%23&amp;from=default">#考研复试网上咨询开始#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6083330079" usercard="id=6083330079">AmazingLBJ</a>：净搞些形式主义来虚的，问就是继续关注学校官网，什么实质性东西都问不出来。人民日报你怎么还好意思发？        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E8%97%8F%E9%9B%AA%E5%B1%B1%E8%84%9A%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E6%A2%A6%E5%A2%83%E6%93%8D%E5%9C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#西藏雪山脚下的梦境操场#</a>，学生仿佛在油画中上体育课<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，西藏那曲，嘉黎县一中学，学生在漂亮如油画的操场上体育课的视频走红网络。湛蓝的天，流动的白云，静穆的雪山下，学生们尽情地踢着足球，跑道上的积水映着雪山的倒影美得无以伦比。网友：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A3%81%E7%BA%B8%E7%BA%A7%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E5%9C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#壁纸级足球场#</a>！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497931341801301:2017607-video:2017607%3A4497897345974287:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497931341801301:2803301701" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wsPXCz" alt="http://t.cn/A6wsPXCz" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <p class="icon"><span class="W_icon icon_rederrorS"></span></p><p class="txt">由于用户设置，你无法回复评论。</p>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497929593143304" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF5AXdbIs?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 11:57" date="1587873445000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497929593143304:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 11:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家市场监督管理总局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%9F%A5%E8%8E%B7%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E8%B6%858904%E4%B8%87%E5%8F%AA%23&amp;from=default">#全国查获问题口罩超8904万只#</a>】国务院新闻办公室今日上午10时举行新闻发布会，全国打击侵权假冒工作领导小组办公室主任、国家市场监督管理总局副局长甘霖介绍，新冠肺炎疫情发生以来，口罩、额温枪等防护用品一度是紧俏，一些不法分子借机制售假冒伪劣防护产品，包括熔喷布等 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF5AXdbIs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497929593143304:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497929593143304&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【@ 全国大学生！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B6%8520%E4%B8%AA%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#超20个省份明确高校开学时间#</a>】今天，又有一地明确高校开学时间：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A15%E6%9C%8811%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#重庆高校5月11日起开学#</a>。截至目前，四川、吉林、安徽、内蒙古、上海等超过20个省份明确高校开学时间，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E6%B1%87%E6%80%BB%23&amp;from=default">#最新高校开学时间汇总#</a>↓↓转发周知，持续更新中！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5840388748&amp;cid=4497922501084722&amp;nick=先拥有一桶水&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4497917132023074" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF5gR8uie?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 11:07" date="1587870474000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497917132023074:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 11:07</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%9F%E8%A5%BF25%E4%B8%AA%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E5%8E%BF%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%E9%80%80%E5%87%BA%23&amp;from=default">#江西25个贫困县全部实现脱贫退出#</a>】4月26日10时，江西省举行新闻发布会。发布会上宣布，经县级申请、市级初审、省级专项评估检查和向社会公示等程序，于都县、兴国县、宁都县、赣县区、鄱阳县、修水县、都昌县均符合贫困县退出条件。经研究，批准以上7个贫困县脱贫退出。至此，江西全省25个贫困县全 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF5gR8uie" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497917132023074:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497917132023074&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【这些数字告诉你，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E5%86%B3%E8%83%9C%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%E8%80%8C%E6%88%98%23&amp;from=default">#为决胜脱贫而战#</a>的中国有多拼】连续7年每年减贫1000万人以上，贫困发生率由10.2%降至0.6%，12个省区市贫困县全部脱贫摘帽……我国脱贫攻坚取得决定性成就。但突如其来的疫情给脱贫攻坚战带来新的挑战。绷紧弦、加把劲，我们一起加油，战疫战贫，两场仗都要赢！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【白衣天使，一路走好！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2345%E5%B2%81%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E7%A6%BB%E4%B8%96%E6%8D%90%E7%8C%AE%E9%81%97%E4%BD%93%23&amp;from=default">#45岁护士离世捐献遗体#</a>】4月23日，45岁的常熟市中医院护士徐美红不幸离世，她从事护理工作已25年。去年9月，徐美红被查出肠癌，她的儿子当时刚进大学，她选择保密，默默接受着化疗。直到寒假，她儿子才得知真相。根据徐美红的遗愿，家属捐献了她的遗体，用于医学研究。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF51JcMqp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497907753046085:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497907753046085&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转扩！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E7%9C%81%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE2.5%E5%A4%A9%E4%BC%91%E5%81%87%23&amp;from=default">#多省明确2.5天休假#</a>】24日，安徽省印发通知，各类单位结合自身实际，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E5%AE%9E%E6%96%BD%E5%91%A8%E6%9C%AB2.5%E5%A4%A9%E5%BC%B9%E6%80%A7%E4%BD%9C%E6%81%AF%23&amp;from=default">#安徽实施周末2.5天弹性作息#</a>，真正把带薪休假制度落到实处。近日，已有多省明确，在有条件的情况下实行2.5天休假。每周多半天假期，有你的家乡吗？ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#重庆高校开学时间#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A15%E6%9C%8811%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#重庆高校5月11日起开学#</a>】重庆高校2020年春季学期实行错峰错时分批次有序开学复课。5月11日起，按照“一校一策”原则，达到条件的高校可安排毕业年级（含高职和本、硕、博）、医学专业、医学类院校和有科研任务的师生第一批开学复课，其余批次有关年级开学复课时间由各高校统筹 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF4L1v43a" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497897397403740:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497897397403740&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7336326027" usercard="id=7336326027">Ling-Howie</a>：套用朋友的话：我不想冒着感染的风险去寝室上网课。没什么意义 开学再隔离 到期末考也就一个月的时间 再怎么样有些专业的实验也没法补，就算补也会形成很大的学业压力 既然要封闭管理，那为什么不早开学，反正都隔离起来 现在国内疫情差不多都快过去了又这样子严格。看看其他学校直接公布本学期不开学        </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IF4zYj0ae&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609497653&amp;ssig=IF2i8tnFAp" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497890544528866" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF4zYj0ae?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 09:22" date="1587864134000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497890544528866:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 09:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【面积约9个篮球场！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%81%AB%E6%98%9F%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E6%8E%A5%E6%94%B670%E7%B1%B3%E5%A4%A9%E7%BA%BF%E6%88%90%E5%8A%9F%E5%90%8A%E8%A3%85%23&amp;from=default">#火星探测数据接收70米天线成功吊装#</a>】作为我国火星探测数据接收的关键设备，70米天线25日成功进行反射体的整体吊装。该项目将成为<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%9A%E6%B4%B2%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%95%E5%8F%A3%E5%BE%84%E5%85%A8%E5%8F%AF%E5%8A%A8%E5%A4%A9%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#亚洲最大的单口径全可动天线#</a>。相比于探月工程最长40万公里的数据信号接收距离，我国首次火星探测工程最远将接收来自4亿公里外的数据信号。&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF4zYj0ae" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497890544528866:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497890544528866&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E5%80%A1%E5%AF%BC%E6%97%A0%E9%A2%84%E7%BA%A6%E4%B8%8D%E5%87%BA%E9%97%A8%23&amp;from=default">#湖北五一假期倡导无预约不出门#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=武汉发布">@武汉发布</a> ，24日，湖北召开会议发布《湖北省“五一”假日出游提示》，倡导“无预约不出游”理念。截至24日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%B7%B2%E5%BC%80%E6%94%BE%E7%9A%84266%E5%AE%B6%E6%99%AF%E5%8C%BA%E5%B0%86%E5%88%86%E6%97%B6%E6%AE%B5%E9%A2%84%E7%BA%A6%23&amp;from=default">#湖北已开放的266家景区将分时段预约#</a>。“五一”期间，全省12家5A级景区将全部有序开放。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%9330%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增无症状感染30例#</a>】4月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者30例，其中境外输入无症状感染者7例；当日转为确诊病例4例（无境外输入）；当日解除医学观察9例（境外输入6例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者1000例（境外输入151例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497874269784609" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF49IF3qh?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 08:17" date="1587860255000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497874269784609:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 08:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增5例境外输入病例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，4月25日0—24时，新增5例境外输入病例。境外输入现有确诊病例694例（含重症病例22例），现有疑似病例10例。累计确诊病例1634例，累计治愈出院病例940例，无死亡病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A11%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊11例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E6%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增6例本土病例#</a>】4月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例11例，其中5例为境外输入病例，6例为本土病例（黑龙江5例，广东1例）；无新增死亡病例；无新增疑似病例。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病例48例，解除医学观察的密切接触者779 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF49pvLeU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497874077569760:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497874077569760&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                                    <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                                <!-- 回复 -->
                                <!-- 赞 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497869840623284" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IF42A2C8Y?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-26 07:59" date="1587859198000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497869840623284:fromprofile"> 2020-4-26 07:59</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江新增5例本土病例#</a>：哈尔滨2例，牡丹江3例】2020年4月25日0-24时，黑龙江省省内新增确诊病例5例，其中：哈尔滨2例，牡丹江3例。哈尔滨新增2例均为在哈医大一院确诊病例的密切接触者，均是已纳入集中医学观察之中进一步排查出来的；牡丹江新增3例均为境外输入关联的无症状感染者转为确诊病例。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IF42A2C8Y" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497869840623284:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497869840623284&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                             【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" 挥舞着透明翅膀像跳舞<img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/8a\/2018new_xin_org.png\" title=\"[心]\" alt=    \"[心]\" type=\"face\" \/>】近日，俄罗斯潜水员在白海冰下拍到裸海蝶。裸海蝶是一种浮游软体动物，生活在北极、南极等寒冷海域的冰层之下，因游动时拍动着透明的两翼，外型看似传说中的天使，又被人称作“海天使”。<a                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%2328%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E7%BB%8F%E6%B7%B1%E5%9C%B3%E5%8F%A3%E5%B2%B8%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%B0%B1%E5%9C%B0%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB14%E5%A4%A9%23&from=default\">#28日起经深圳口岸入境就地集中隔离14天#<\/a>】26日，深圳市人民政府口岸办公室发布通知称，根据广东省疫情防控工作的统一部署，自4月28日8时起，经深圳口岸入境人员，均需在深圳市就地集中隔离医学观察14天，请各位旅客提前做好准备。<a href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%80%E5%A0%82%E4%B8%8D%E5%BC%A0%E5%98%B4%E7%9A%84%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90%E8%AF%BE%23&from=default\">#如何上一堂不张嘴的音乐课#<\/a>？老师：打节奏学乐理】王鑫是四川眉山一所中学的音乐老师，负责学校12个班级的音乐课。疫情期间，学生们上课遇到了难题：戴口罩唱歌会闷，摘口罩有风险。王鑫决定用节奏训练法教授乐理知识，还制作了课件带领同学们一起“搞气氛”。结果学生们“比平时唱歌还要积极”。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a                                                <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E8%A2%AB%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E8%AF%B4%E9%95%BF%E8%83%96%E4%BA%86%E8%BE%B9%E5%93%AD%E8%BE%B9%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%23&from=default\">#小朋友被老师说长胖了边哭边运动#<\/a> 越想越委屈蹲角落里呜呜呜】4月24日，天津一位小朋友与老师视频时，老师开玩笑地说他长胖了。小家伙反驳后生气地挂了班级视频。之后他开始疯狂运动，一边运动一边哭，最后干脆回房间躲角落里哭去了。网友：我要有这个自尊心早瘦成闪电了 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2803301701\/IF8H6iv2L\"                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E9%BB%84%E5%B2%9B%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=黄岛发布\">@黄岛发布<\/a> 发布通告，截至4月26日下午4时，黄岛小珠山山林火灾仍有辛安街道上庄区域一处火点，现场扑救工作仍在进行中。因火情现场地形险峻、扑救人员无法到达，现场指挥部统一调动消防飞机6架实施扑救，调动无人机4架 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2803301701\/IF8cR4BJo\" class=\"WB_text_opt\"                                                                                                              【浙江高校<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%BF%E7%AE%A1%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%A8%E4%B8%80%E5%91%A8%E4%BA%91%E6%8E%A5%E5%8D%95%E6%99%92%E8%A2%AB3000%E6%9D%A1%23&from=default\">#宿管阿姨一周云接单晒被3000条#<\/a>】浙江绍兴文理学院日前向近3个月未返校的学生发送提示，需要晾晒被子或有其他服务的同学，可提出后由宿管阿姨代办。一周下来，数十名宿管阿姨已经晒了3000条被子。除晒被子外，阿姨还帮助同学们给绿植浇水等。网友：好羡慕这样的宿管阿姨<img
